name: site-layouts-monorepo
description: MVP+ Site Layouts - AI-driven site layout optimization platform

scripts.build: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w backend && npm run build -w frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w frontend && npm run lint -w backend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix -w frontend && npm run lint:fix -w backend
scripts.test: npm run test -w frontend && npm run test -w backend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage -w frontend && npm run test:coverage -w backend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules shared/node_modules frontend/dist backend/dist shared/dist
